title: Monthly exchange rate of USD to GBP 2017 to 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows USD GBP exchange rate for 25 number of Months.
The USD GBP exchange rate is highest at Month Aug 19 and lowest at Month Mar 18.
The highest Month Aug 19 has 0.11 more USD GBP exchange rate than the lowest Month Mar 18.
min_summary: This bar chart has 25 columns on the x axis representing Month, and USD GBP exchange rate in each Month on the y axis.
The USD GBP exchange rate is highest at Month Aug 19 and lowest at Month Mar 18.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows USD GBP exchange rate for 25 number of Months.
The USD GBP exchange rate is highest at Month Aug 19 and lowest at Month Mar 18.
The highest Month Aug 19 has 0.11 more USD GBP exchange rate than the lowest Month Mar 18.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows USD GBP exchange rate for 25 number of Months.
The USD GBP exchange rate is appeared to be the highest at Month Aug 19 and lowest at Month Mar 18.
The second highest USD GBP exchange rate is appeared to be the Month Jul 19.
The minimum Month Mar 18 has got 1.15 times less USD GBP exchange rate than the maximum Month Aug 19.
USD GBP exchange rate at Month Aug 19 is 0.82 , second place is Jul 19 at 0.82, and thirdly is Oct 18 at 0.79.
Overall USD GBP exchange rate has reduced over the Months.
Month Jan 19, Sep 18, Jul 18, Jun 18, and Oct 17 have the same USD GBP exchange rate.
The average USD GBP exchange rate in all 25 Months is 0.76.
The USD GBP exchange rate is 19.07 if we add up values of all Months.
